metadata.title: The Grid | Data Explorer
metadata.description: Powering Discoverability of Assets, Products, and Services in Web3.

banner.text: YOU SHOULD NOT USE THIS AS A DAILY DRIVER. This is a reference implementation of The Grid's data which is in Beta - API users can pick and show data relevant to their users.

hero.badge: An experimental UI by The Grid
hero.title: Breakpoint in a way you haven't seen before.
hero.description: Sponsors and attendees can list on the grid, search, and filter through all Breakpoint profiles in one place.

productTypeGroups.label: Trading & Exchanges
productTypeGroups.description: Platforms and tools for buying, selling, and trading digital assets across centralized and decentralized venues.

productTypeGroups.label: DeFi Protocols
productTypeGroups.description: Decentralized financial services including lending, staking, yield optimization, and derivatives protocols.

productTypeGroups.label: Blockchain Infrastructure
productTypeGroups.description: Core blockchain networks, data feeds, node infrastructure, and validation services powering the decentralized web.

productTypeGroups.label: Cross-chain & Interoperability
productTypeGroups.description: Technologies enabling asset transfers and communication between different blockchain networks.

productTypeGroups.label: Wallets & Custody
productTypeGroups.description: Solutions for storing, securing, and managing digital assets from consumer wallets to institutional custody.

productTypeGroups.label: Data & Analytics
productTypeGroups.description: Blockchain data indexing, analytics, explorers, and risk assessment tools for onchain insights.

productTypeGroups.label: Developer Tools
productTypeGroups.description: Development frameworks, security auditing, testing tools, and bug bounty platforms for blockchain builders.

productTypeGroups.label: Payments
productTypeGroups.description: Comprehensive payment infrastructure including fiat on/off-ramps, merchant solutions, cards, invoicing, and accounting.

productTypeGroups.label: NFTs & Digital Assets
productTypeGroups.description: Marketplaces and platforms for creating, launching, and trading NFTs, stablecoins, and real-world asset tokens.

productTypeGroups.label: Gaming
productTypeGroups.description: Blockchain-based games, gaming infrastructure, and gambling platforms utilizing digital assets.

productTypeGroups.label: AI & Agents
productTypeGroups.description: Autonomous AI agents, platforms, and frameworks for intelligent onchain automation and decision-making.

productTypeGroups.label: Social & Identity
productTypeGroups.description: Decentralized social networks, identity solutions, and DAO governance platforms for communities.

productTypeGroups.label: Specialized Services
productTypeGroups.description: Niche infrastructure including compute networks, decentralized storage, DePIN, IoT, and privacy solutions.

productTypeGroups.label: Business Services
productTypeGroups.description: Professional services, education, venture support, events, media, and business platforms for the crypto ecosystem.

productTypeGroups.label: Other Products
productTypeGroups.description: Miscellaneous products and services including browsers, prediction markets, ticketing, retail, and more.
